ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly you are one of the Messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That you are indeed one of those sent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you are truly among the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) are indeed one of the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, you are one of the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely you are one of the apostles
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou art truly among the Envoys
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thou art of those sent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: you are indeed one of the messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thou art of the sent ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: you are indeed one of the apostles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou art indeed one of the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly, you (O Muhammad SAW) are one of the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: you (Prophet Muhammad) are truly among the Messengers sent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:3] you, O Muhammad (s), are indeed of those sent [by God],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! thou art) O Muhammad (of those sent) it is also said that this is an oath by which Allah swore: He swore by the Ya', the Sin and the wise Qur'an and He did also swear by the Qur'an which exposits the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.
